trans-unit.source: Represents a handle that has been registered when calling <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject*>.
trans-unit.target: 代表呼叫<xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject*>.</xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject*>時已註冊的控制代碼

trans-unit.source: Cancels a registered wait operation issued by the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject*> method.
trans-unit.target: 取消已註冊之等候作業發給<xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject*>方法。</xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject*>

trans-unit.source: If `waitObject` is specified, it is signaled only if the <xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle> is successfully unregistered.
trans-unit.target: 如果`waitObject`指定時，才收到信號<xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle>已成功取消註冊。</xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle>

trans-unit.source: If a callback method is in progress when Unregister executes, `waitObject` is not signaled until the callback method completes.
trans-unit.target: 如果回呼方法正在進行中取消註冊執行時，`waitObject`回呼方法完成之前未收到信號。

trans-unit.source: In particular, if a callback method executes Unregister, `waitObject` is not signaled until that callback method completes.
trans-unit.target: 特別是，如果回呼方法會執行取消登錄 」`waitObject`該回呼方法完成之前未收到信號。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the function succeeds; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果函式成功則否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
